    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move​(int fromRow,
                 int fromCol,
                 int toRow,
                 int toCol)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: MarbleSolitaireModel
        Move a single marble from a given position to another given position. A move is valid only if the from and to positions are valid. Specific implementations may place additional constraints on the validity of a move.
        Specified by:
        move in interface MarbleSolitaireModel
        Parameters:
        fromRow - the row number of the position to be moved from (starts at 0)
        fromCol - the column number of the position to be moved from (starts at 0)
        toRow - the row number of the position to be moved to (starts at 0)
        toCol - the column number of the position to be moved to (starts at 0)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the move is not possible

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Description copied from interface: MarbleSolitaireModel
        Determine and return if the game is over or not. A game is over if no more moves can be made.
        Specified by:
        isGameOver in interface MarbleSolitaireModel
        Returns:
        true if the game is over, false otherwise

        Description copied from interface: MarbleSolitaireModelState

        Specified by:
        getSlotAt in interface MarbleSolitaireModelState
        Parameters:

        col - the column of the position sought, starting at 0
        Returns:
        the state of the slot at the given row and column
        Throws:
